ValidationRule.description: Requires that a human has confirmed the advice has been shared with the client prior to progressing advice to the meeting held stage or beyond.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && NOT(AdvicePresented__c) && (ISPICKVAL(Advice_Status__c, "Await decision") || ISPICKVAL(Advice_Status__c, "Awaiting acceptance") || ISPICKVAL(Advice_Status__c, "In fulfilment") || ISPICKVAL(Advice_Status__c, "Suitability Declined") || ISPICKVAL(Advice_Status__c, "Complete")) && NOT(AdviceType__r.DeveloperName__c = "REGULAR_AMENDMENT")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please confirm how the advice was presented to the customer by using the Advice Presented button.
